reason: Task analysis: Identify and count letter 'E' occurrences in a specific phrase displayed in white letters on red background at the 30-second mark of Game Grumps' 2012 Sonic the Hedgehog (2006) Let's Play first episode. All three members successfully located the correct video ('Sonic '06: Oh No - PART 1' with video ID t7AtQHXCW5s) and employed video processing techniques to extract frames at the 30-second mark. Member 1 conducted comprehensive OCR analysis identifying the phrase as game menu text '= MAIN MENU | SINGLE PLAYER : >> EPISODE SELECT TRIAL SELECT GOLD MEDAL RESULTS Episode Select: Play through the storyline Select @Back' and counted 19 occurrences of letter 'E' through automated text processing with robust verification methods. Member 2 performed detailed image analysis with pixel counting (26,908 red pixels, 27,856 white pixels) but incorrectly identified the phrase as simply 'SONIC '06', yielding 0 occurrences of 'E' - this represents a significant analytical error in text extraction scope. Member 3 used similar video processing and OCR methodology, correctly identifying the full game menu interface text and confirming 19 occurrences of letter 'E'. Convergence analysis: Members 1 and 3 reached identical conclusions (19 occurrences) using comprehensive OCR analysis of the complete menu interface, while Member 2 diverged significantly (0 occurrences) due to incomplete text extraction. Cross-validation reveals Members 1 and 3 employed more thorough analytical approaches, capturing the full context of white text on red background rather than focusing on a single element. Synthesis evaluation: The convergent result of 19 occurrences from two independent comprehensive analyses provides high confidence, supported by detailed OCR extraction and automated counting verification.
